name: Not Dead Enough (Sofia)
description:
Not Dead Enough is a university project done in a group.

it is a 3D Co-op Multiplayer, First-person Zombie Survival game made in Unreal Engine 4 for Windows PC.

You are part of a small group of people fighting for your life in a world overrun by zombies. 

After a big incident that turned more than half of the earth's population into zombies, you and your friends have volunteered to clear a small neighborhood where the leaders of your shelter want to move into. Once you arrive you see yourselves trapped there and now you must survive.
